subsystems.implemented_scope: Phase-0 startup fixture path is implemented (`__libc_start_main`, `__frankenlibc_startup_phase0`, `__frankenlibc_startup_snapshot`) with invariant capture and strict/hardened tests.
subsystems.deferred_scope: Full `csu`/TLS init-order hardening and secure-mode closure campaign remains open.
subsystems.doc_line: - `startup`: `IMPLEMENTED_PARTIAL` — implemented scope: phase-0 startup fixture path (`__libc_start_main`, `__frankenlibc_startup_phase0`, snapshot invariants). Deferred scope: full `csu`/TLS init-order hardening and secure-mode closure campaign.

subsystems.implemented_scope: Runtime-math threading routing and selected pthread semantics are live.
subsystems.deferred_scope: `pthread_abi` still contains call-through surface; lifecycle/TLS/teardown closure beads remain open.
subsystems.doc_line: - `threading`: `IN_PROGRESS` — implemented scope: runtime-math threading routing and selected pthread semantics are live. Deferred scope: eliminate remaining `pthread_abi` call-through surface and close lifecycle/TLS stress beads.

subsystems.implemented_scope: Bootstrap numeric resolver ABI path is implemented (`getaddrinfo`, `freeaddrinfo`, `getnameinfo`, `gai_strerror`).
subsystems.deferred_scope: Full retry/cache/poisoning hardening campaign remains open.
subsystems.doc_line: - `resolver`: `IMPLEMENTED_PARTIAL` — implemented scope: bootstrap numeric resolver ABI (`getaddrinfo`, `freeaddrinfo`, `getnameinfo`, `gai_strerror`). Deferred scope: full retry/cache/poisoning hardening campaign.

subsystems.implemented_scope: Passwd/group lookup entrypoints are exported and marked `Implemented` via `pwd_abi` and `grp_abi`.
subsystems.deferred_scope: Hosts/backend breadth plus NSS concurrency/cache-coherence closure remain pending.
subsystems.doc_line: - `nss`: `IMPLEMENTED_PARTIAL` — implemented scope: passwd/group APIs are exported as `Implemented` via `pwd_abi`/`grp_abi`. Deferred scope: hosts/backend breadth plus NSS concurrency/cache-coherence closure.

subsystems.implemented_scope: Bootstrap locale ABI path is implemented for `setlocale` and `localeconv`.
subsystems.doc_line: - `locale`: `IMPLEMENTED_PARTIAL` — implemented scope: bootstrap `setlocale`/`localeconv` C/POSIX path. Deferred scope: catalog, collation, and transliteration parity expansion.

subsystems.implemented_scope: Phase-1 iconv ABI path is implemented (`iconv_open`, `iconv`, `iconv_close`) with deterministic strict/hardened fixture coverage.
subsystems.deferred_scope: Full `iconvdata` breadth and deterministic table-generation closure remain open.
subsystems.doc_line: - `iconv`: `IMPLEMENTED_PARTIAL` — implemented scope: phase-1 `iconv_open`/`iconv`/`iconv_close` conversions with deterministic strict+hardened fixtures. Deferred scope: full `iconvdata` breadth and deterministic table-generation closure.
